talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html> {ui_string: 1200001} </html>
<html> {ui_string: 1200002} </html>
<html> {ui_string: 1200003} </html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html> {ui_string: 1200005} </html>

$Elite Soldier$
Sorry but I am busy at the moment.I am required to submit written apologies because of what had happen at Calderock Village
During this period, you could pay a visit to the General?

$Argenta$
Huh? Why are you here?
Go and get your business done.

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Hey you! What about Argenta!
Why isn't she back yet!

$Bishop Ignacio$
General Douglas is gathering up the troops, so talk to him

$General Douglas$
Our troopsare all suffering from fatigue due to prolong fighting with monster..
Not to worry, we will send our troops to Dark Overlord Keeponce we completed gathering the troops.

$Bishop Ignacio$
General Douglas is trying to gather troops, go talk to him.

$Argenta$
Why are you here now?
I'm busy right now, go away and do your stuff

$Argenta$
Huh? You are still here?
Go and do what you must do now!.

$Blond Swordsman$
...
(It seem like he don't wish to talk.)

$Elite Soldiers$
Sorry but I am busy at the moment.I am required to submit written apologies because of what had happen at Calderock Village

$General Douglas$
I need to know the progress of gathering troops
Go to Elite Soldiers and the situation over there.

$General Douglas$
Report to me once the preparations are completed
In the mean time, I would monitor the situation ofDark Mines, and prepare logistic for the fight against Black Knight.

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Hey you! Argenta!
What causes the delay in her returns

$General Douglas$
Report to me once the preparations are completed
In the mean time, I would monitor the situation ofDark Mines, and prepare logistic for the fight against Black Knight.

$Elite Soldier$
There an emergency recall for all Elite Soldiers to gather at Saint Haven right now

$Elite Soldier$
I doubt there are many reserve troops remain in the castle as we have always being having regional war with monster for a long period

$Elite Soldier$
I had release an recall notice to all troops that are out station to returned.
Get your ready and please wait awhile more
(

$Elite Soldier$
Troops that have returned can be dispatched now.
Report to theGeneral, and wait for his commands.

$Elite Soldier$
Recalled troops have been gathered
Report to General Douglas, and wait for the next command.

$General Douglas$
Is that all that you had recalled?
It's not as much as I expected, however all this troops are experienced and well-trained through many battle.

$General Douglas$
The destination is Dark Overlord Keep... While fighting the Black Knight, we would not be able to proceed all the way inside the place, which is also his base. We need to obtain more information which would benefit us later on.

$General Douglas${action:talk}
Move it now!
We will never give up! Given all you can to rescue the Prophet.

$General Douglas$
The 1st company of the elite troops have left
Prepare yourself and advance toDark Overlord keep and join the troops.
? You cannot proceed the quest while you are in a party.

$General Douglas$
The proud elite troops are set to departprepare and get ready to join
※ You cannot proceed the quest while you are in a party.

$General Douglas$
The 1st company of the elite troops have left.
Prepare yourself and advance to Dark Overlord Keep and join the company.

$Elite Soldier$
The troops are preparing themselves for depart. You may advance first, the troops will be catching up with you, relax and advance to Dark Overlord keep.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Take care on the trips, I hope General Douglas's troop would be helpful
Now head to Dark Overlord Keep.

$Blond Swordsman$
...
(Look like he having a conversation withArgenta.)

$Argenta$
I can differentiate the sound of your footstep from others {user_nick}.
I'not surprise that you could find me in here

$Argenta$
How could I fOgret? ThatGeraint.
Didn't I mentioned to you before?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I saw him fighting the Black Knight at Abandoned Welton Hollow.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Yes. What with your reaction?
You never meetGeraint?

$Argenta$
Oh? So you do saw him and you allowed this fool to get away?
Geraint, how did you manage to let that guy run away just? I don't understand it at all

$Argenta$
GeraintAre you listening to me ! ?

$Argenta$
You are not allow to followGeraint.

$Argenta$
Do not over estimate yourself and get yourself killed. Even I myself also doubt I can be of much help. So let's head to Foothills of Black Mountain now. Follow me and stay close.

$Argenta$
What are you waiting for now?
Get yourself ready, we are going Foothills of Black Mountain soon.
Don't ever think that you are already as skillful as Geraint. Understand?

$General Douglas$
Have you taken good care of everything? Dark Overlord Keep?
It look as thou the troops have returned safely

$Bishop Ignacio$
Did you see Argenta? Try to receive all information you from her.
(You must talk to Argenta atFoothills of Black Mountain.)

$Geraint$
...
(it seem like he is reluctant to talk.)

$Argenta$
You ain't suspose to be here
Don't pester me. Go and do what you need to do now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Velskud? That the Black Knight name right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
I wonder if Geraint is lost.
It's unimgainable that he is still so coward even after the inicident that happend Velskud... Tsk tsk.

$Argenta$
What? Shouldn't you know all this before I even told you? You had chased the Ancient all the way here, and now you're telling me you do not know about it

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Velskud?! Geraint?!!
Yes! Argenta is great
I understand that she is close to the Six Heroes!

$Argenta$
Can't he just keep quiet for a moment?
I'm going to take a break, in the mean time, go and shut himfool up, rookie!

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Heh Heh HehArgenta never fOgret about me afterall!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What are you talking about? The Legendary Six Heroes?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Oh, Argenta!
I knew it! I knew it all along that you are not that simple. But I am surprise that you are acquainted with the legendary Six Heroes!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>... I can't believe I am hearing insults from you... I'm a little angry now.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
What the.....????
You don't know who is theSix Heroes...?
Are you stupid? How can you not know theSix Heroes!!!!!

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Tsk tsk, how dumb... I will specially explain it for you, so listen carefully!

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
50 years ago! The Black Dragon Karas, was critically wounded. Now it had been awakened. The world during that period of time was terrorise by Black Dragon Karas, people were running for their life!

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Tsk tsk... You are heartless...
Anyway, Six Looking to defeat the Black Dragon Karas, heroes have gather here from all over the world.

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
First! There was Geraint, the blond swordsman who appeared surprisingly to fight Black Dragon Karas! He was not only leader of the Dragon Slayers, he was also the founder of Dragon Slayers! Without him, the Six Heroes wouldn't have existed!

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Second! There was Captain Velskud, who was born from a lower class noble family, using his own skills, he became the greatest knight and current position of the kingdom at a young age

$Argenta's Slave AdventurerAdventurer David$
Third! There was Barnac, who was Captain of many Mercenaries and a mercenary himself. Those that he had led has become the foundation of theAdventurer's Guild! He is an idol to all warriors and Mercenaries

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Fourth! The leader of the Silver Crescent Archers, Nerwin, who came from a land of Elves called Anwarende to establish connection between the Elves and Humans. It is said to have being Crown the Queen of Elves upon returned

$Argenta's Slave AdventurerAdventurer David$
Fifth! Terra, the Templar Knights who is the Leader and had served Altea goddess, has since established the Divine Order

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Sixth! Karacule, the one who comes from the line of descent of the Sorceresses of Dark Tower Magic! The power of the Dark Tower Magic that she leads, is so powerful that it cause both allies and foes to shiver in fear

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I not sure about it. The Geraint and Velskud that I know are so....</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Ugh Ugh Ugh... How was it?
Were you moved by my knowledge?

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
You're Serious? They don't even look like humans, they are too strong. They looked like in theirs 20s and it has being 50 years since the Dragon Raid...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well I should be heading back... See ya...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Wait Wait.. I was told that Velskud died during the Dragon Raid, Barnac and Geraint went missing after.
So that mean Argenta is not really acquainted with the heroes?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I made a promise, that I would find...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Humpf. I thought I am going to see my idol Geraint
Hey what are you trying to do by slipping in and out of the Royal Castle on daily basis?

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Seriously you're so fake despite being so young.
Stop thinking that Argenta will be interested in you after what you did? She is my Queen ha ha ha !

$Argenta$
What are you waiting for?
I'll be going to Foothill of Foothills of Black Mountain, so be there.
Stop dreaming that your as good as Geraint

$Argenta$
Did you really wentRoyal Castle? I don't think you went. Are you thinking about following Geraint, are you? You are now just some one that get in the way. So stop thinking about it and do what you need to do.

$Argenta$
Humans towns are so boring and full of useless event like Adventurer's Guild .Go and received some unique training to get yourself stronger.
(You must report to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
Welcome.
What happened to the Black Knight? Did you find him?

$Bishop Ignacio$
Hmmm ... The Fortress of the Dark Overlord Army... It would be careless of you to just follow blindly into somewhere like that. Did the swordsman who was with Argenta run away?
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Bishop Ignacio$
While you were chasing the Black Knight,I tired to request for more troops from Kings and his followers
However there is troubles inside and outsideSaint Haven recently, so it was understood that is hard to mobilize any more troops

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
H Ha Ha no one can replace me as Argenta's Slave, I will always be her slave
(You must report to Bishop Ignacio.)

journal.title: Prepare to dispatch troops
journal.contents:
Talk to General Douglas about the situation on the preparations for the dispatch.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → General Douglas

journal.title: Soldier's Situation
journal.contents:
Elite Soldier is recalling all available troops. Check the siutation

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Elite Soldier
journal.todo_msg: Find Elite Soldier and check how the gathering troops situation

journal.title: Report to General Douglas
journal.contents:
Report to General Douglas. The recalling of troops is not completed yet

Saint Haven Royal Castle → General Douglas
journal.todo_msg: Recalling of troops has completed. Report to General Douglas

journal.title: To Dark Overlord Keep
journal.contents:
General Douglas kind to lend you his troops Go to Dark Overlord keep.


Foothills of Black Mountain(Dark Overlord Gates) → Dark Overlord Keep
journal.destination: Hunt Black Knight at Dark Overlord Keep
journal.todo_msg: Please head over to Dark Overlord Keep and hunt the Black Knight

journal.title: The Black Knight's Location
journal.contents:
You arrived at Dark Overlord Keep, Black Knight was not in sight but you met Argenta and Blond Swordsman
Talk to Argenta.


Foothills of Black Mountain (Dark Overlord Gates) → Dark Overlord Keep(Argenta)
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at Dark Overlord keep
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to Argenta. There is only one Black Knight

journal.title: Blond Swordsman
journal.contents:
Blond Swordsman was the one who fought against the Black Knight at Abandoned Welton Hollow was Geraint, the one that Argenta was looking for. He left Argenta behind to chase the Black Knight
Talk to Argenta and discuss future plan.


Foothills of Black Mountain(Dark Overlord Gates) → Dark Overlord Keep(Argenta)
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at Dark Overlord keep
journal.todo_msg: Geraint had left, Please talk to Argenta

journal.title: Argenta
journal.contents:
Geraint rushed to chase the Black Knight. Since you cannot follow Geraint right away, talk to Argenta at Foothills of Foothills of Black Mountain.

Foothills of Black Mountain → Argenta
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at Footshill of Foothills of Black Mountain
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to Argenta at Footshill of Foothills of Black Mountain

journal.title: A noisy Adventurer David
journal.contents:
Adventurer David always make himself a nuisance when you and Argenta are talking about Velskud and Geraint.
Talk to Adventurer David at Foothills of Black Mountain.

Foothills of Black Mountain → Argenta's Slave Adventurer David
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer David at Footshills of Foothills of Black Mountain
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to Adventurer David at Foothills of Black Mountain

journal.title: Do what you need to do now
journal.contents:
You are not allow to follow Geraint right now. Head to the Royal Castle first, and report to Ignacio and request for support.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio
journal.todo_msg: Report to Bishop Ignacio at the Royal Castle
